page.title: 08Costessey Industry
page.content: Both New and Old Costessey are mainly dormitories for people who work in the Norwich area, although there are a few light industries along the south side of the Dereham Road (A47). There is farmland between Old and New Costessey, and beyond Old Costessey, but this provides little employment these days. The main industry in Costessey in the last century was brickmaking, which was quite a flourishing business; of course, farming provided more employment then, too. A sizeable number of people in Costessey run service industries from home (decorating, building, skip hire, etc.).
